articles.title: “Extraordinary” 4,000-Year-Old Egyptian Skull Reveals Surgical Attempts at Cancer Care - SciTechDaily

Skull and mandible 236, dating from between 2687 and 2345 BCE, belonged to a male individual aged 30 to 35. Credit: Tondini, Isidro, Camarós, 2024, edited
